title: Dinnerbone：本周无快照
author: kaho
txt_content:
本帖最后由 kaho 于 2014-6-11 20:48 编辑 




@Dinnerbone
Remember, there will not be a Minecraft PC snapshot this week. If you eat up all your greens & hug your parents, you might get one next week
请记住，这一周将不会有 Minecraft PC 的快照。但如果你吃掉所有的蔬菜 & 给父母一个深情的拥抱，你可能会在下一周得到一个快照

replies.txt_content: 菜吃了，也抱了。坐等快照了

replies.txt_content: Remember, there will not be a Minecraft PC snapshot this week.But if you eat up all your dinner bones & hug jeb, you might get one this week
